artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Published by Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: domed roof building with green trim; stairway at left; large arched doorway lower level center; four green rectangular doors, three on upper level and one below; tall openwork fence at LR corner
